Key Match Events: Ty Jerome posted a career high 24 points on 9-for-15 shooting overall and 4-for-7 from three point range against the Charlotte Hornets.
Jerome also chipped in eight assists while only having two turnovers in his 32 minutes as the Cavaliers routed the Hornets 128-114.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers decided to rest Donovan Mitchell against the Charlotte Hornets, possibly with an eye on their matchup against the Boston Celtics looming on Tuesday night.
